body: Anyone Have a Good Virus Detecter (that gets rid of them also) [FOR FREE PLEASE] I need it to do something. Thanks!
body_tagged: Anyone Have a Good Virus Detecter (that gets rid of them also) [FOR FREE PLEASE] I need it to do something. Thanks!
title: Anti Virus

replies.body:
BitDefender is pretty good, but you'll need to make an account.

It scans for viruses at all times and even warns you if the page you're about to enter has any traps in it.

I used to get background frequencies that would warn me about me having a virus on my computer *(Even though this was a virus in itself)*

But I downloaded BitDefender and watched as it completely quarantined and executed the PUP.optional and many other Malware and spyware programs.
replies.body_tagged:
